PUBLICATIONS:  
 
1. “CHONDROBLASTOMA – A case report & literature review”--In the 
Journal of Orthopaedic Association of South Indian States( OASIS ), Sep 2006 
2. “OSTEOID OSTEOMA – An enigma, Our experience of ten years” – In the 
Journal of  Orthopaedic Association of South Indian States (OASIS), SEP 2007 
3. “Role of PMSTR in management of Resistant/ Rigid & Neglected idiopathic 
CTEV” in the Journal of Karnataka Orthopaedic Associtation (KOA), Feb-2008 

OTHER PAPERS SUBMITTED FOR PUBLICATIONS: 
1.  An approach to surgical management of fractures of distal humerus 
2.  A thirty years journey & review of management stratergies in GCT 
3.  Locking compression plate  -- A boon in complicated fractures 
 
PAPERS PRESENTED: 
 
Indian Orthopaedic Association (IOACON) : 
 
1) “BIOCHEMICAL ANALYSIS OF IMPLANT FAILURE IN FRACTURE 
TREATMENT” was presented in the “SUSHRUT BEST PAPER AWARD

2) Presented a Poster titled “LOCKING COMPRESSION PLATE -- A Boon in 
Complex  fractures!” at the IOACON-2006, held at Newdelhi. 
3) Presented a Poster titled “OSTEOID OSTEOMA –Diagnostic Challenge & 
our experience” at the IOACON-2006, held at Newdelhi.
